new.title: Week of Discounts on Summer Kids' Clothing and Footwear - Hurry Up and Buy

description.paragraph1: Summer is the time for sun and incredible discounts! SUMMER SALE with discounts up to -80% continues at Port Mall Shopping Center. It's an amazing opportunity to refresh your wardrobe: choose the most beautiful dresses, trendy clothes, fashionable accessories, and footwear with unbelievable discounts!
description.paragraph2: Don't miss the chance to make crazy purchases!
description.title: Brands Participating in the Promotion
description.descriptionItem3: Home Clothing Store for Kids - Bebeton
description.descriptionItem4: Toys and Children's Products Store - Chicco
description.paragraph3: The summer vibe continues, and along with it, the musical drive! So, we invite everyone to the coolest SUMMER MUSIC FESTIVAL at Port Mall Shopping Center!
description.paragraph4: Groovy electronic music will light up your hearts, and cool DJs: Dj Antai, Dj Kinree, DJ Evka, MC Nastya Chornychna will provide unforgettable experiences...
